section.section: With the approval of the Secretary, the Council shall appoint an Executive Director of the Council.
The Executive Director may not be a member of the Council.
The Executive Director serves at the pleasure of the Council, subject to the concurrence of the Secretary.
The Executive Director is a special appointment in the State Personnel Management System.

text.section:
Subject to the policies of the Council and the administrative supervision of the Secretary, the Executive Director:
is the administrative officer of the Council staff;
shall appoint and remove employees of the Council; and
shall direct, administer, and supervise the activities of the Council staff.
